Class GlobalConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.config.Config
      • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.config.GlobalConfig

  • @Singleton
public class GlobalConfig
extends Config
    The config defines all configuration values (and the default values)
